Package ui.game

Class MinimumSize<T extends SelectableResponsiveSection>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.drawing.DrawableSection
      • ui.drawing.layout.DrawableResponsiveSection
        • ui.drawing.layout.MinimumSizeSection<T,​U,​V>
          • ui.input.selection.layout.SelectableMinimumSizeSection<SelectableResponsiveSection,​T,​MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog>
            • ui.game.MinimumSize<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of section to show if big enough.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResponsiveSection, PrintHandler, Section, ResizeHandler, SelectableResponsiveSection, SelectableSection, SelectionHandler
    public class MinimumSize<T extends SelectableResponsiveSection>
extends SelectableMinimumSizeSection<SelectableResponsiveSection,​T,​MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog>
    Ensures that the terminal window is big enough to display the game by replacing whats on screen with a message if it's too small.
    A selectable minimum size section.
    Shows a different section if smaller than a certain size.
    A responsive section with a stored number of rows and columns.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
